name: WooCommerce Quickteller Business Payment
author: Interswitch Group

sections.description:
Description

This is a WooCommerce plugin to allow merchants accept payments from customers on their Quickteller Business Account.

Quickteller Business is a platform provided by Interswitch that allows individual unregistered business and registered business to receive payments online via their websites, payment links, invoices, storefront, or via their mobile apps using our mobile SDK.

With this Woocommerce plugins, you can receive transactions via the following channels:

  • Card
  • Quickteller Wallet
  • Transfer
  • QR
  • USSD
  • Pay with Credit

Signup

To signup as a business if you haven’t already done so, you can click here .

License

GNU
